name: ExecutionPlanActivity
comment: Holds the information about the order execution plan activities. Each plan related activity instance, which is shown on the graphical user interface, is stored in this entity. Activities are automated or manual.
vf short description: Holds the information about the order execution plan activities. Each plan related activity instance, which is shown on the graphical user interface, is stored in this entity. Activities are automated or manual.

fields.name: ExecutionPlanActivitySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: ExecutionPlanActivityKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the execution plan activity in aLDM. OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.OID//Generated based on Execution Plan Activity Id

fields.name: ExecutionPlanActivityTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ExecutionPlanActivityStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: ExecutionPlanActivityConvergedStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: ExecutionPlanActivityStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the status changed.

fields.name: ExecutionPlanActivityConvergedStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the converged status changed.

fields.name: ExecutionPlanActivityStateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ExecutionPlanActivityPrevStateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ExecutionPlanSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ExecutionPlanActivityId
fields.comment: Indicates a unique identifier of the record from source. OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.OID

fields.name: ActivityBusinessId
fields.comment: Indicates the business Id of the activity. For example, Amend and Do plans can have same Activity Business Id. OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.ID

fields.name: PrimaryActivityId
fields.comment: Specifies the primary activity Id of the execution plan. OSS_ACTIVITY_GROUP.PRIMARY_ACTIVITY_ID

fields.name: ExecutionReasonSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OssCreationDate
fields.comment: Specifies the execution plan activity record creation date in the source system. OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.CREATE_DATE

fields.name: OssModificationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when an activity was last updated. OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.LAST_UPDATE_DATE

fields.name: CompletedDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when an activity was completed. OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.COMPLETED_DATE

fields.name: ActivityDaysDuration
fields.comment: Duration for the activity days. OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.DAYS

fields.name: ActivityHoursDuration
fields.comment: Activity hours duration. OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.HOURS

fields.name: ActivityMinutesDuration
fields.comment: Activity minutes duration. OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.MINUTES

fields.name: ScheduledFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the activity has been scheduled.Values are:-1=Yes-0=No OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.IS_SCHEDULED

fields.name: OriginalEstimatedStartDate
fields.comment: Specifies the original estimated start date of the activity. OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.ESTIMATED_START_DATE

fields.name: OriginalEstimatedEndDate
fields.comment: Specifies the original estimated end date of the activity. OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.ESTIMATED_END_DATE

fields.name: EstimatedStartDate
fields.comment: Specifies the rescheduled estimated end date of the activity. OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.CURRENT_ESTIMATED_START_DATE

fields.name: EstimatedEndDate
fields.comment: Specifies the rescheduled estimated end date of the activity. OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.CURRENT_ESTIMATED_END_DATE

fields.name: ActualStartDate
fields.comment: Actual start date of the activity. OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.ACTUAL_START_DATE

fields.name: ActualEndDate
fields.comment: Actual activity end date. OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.ACTUAL_END_DATE

fields.name: EmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ExecutionProfileSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ExecutionErrorSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ActivityWorkQueue
fields.comment: Fetch SC_ACTIVITY_MANUAL.WORK_QUEUE using SC_ACTIVITY_MANUAL.ACTIVITY_ID = Execution Plan Activity.Activity Business Id

fields.name: ActivityReworkCounter
fields.comment: OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.REWORK_COUNTER

fields.name: ActivityName
fields.comment: SELECT Act_Name2_Spec_Mapping.DISPLAY_NAME FROM Act_Name2_Spec_Mapping WHEREAct_Name2_Spec_Mapping.Spec_Id=Execution Plan Activity.Activity Spec Version Idand Act_Name2_Spec_Mapping.Version_no=Execution Plan Activity.Activity Spec Version Number//Please validate during implementation

fields.name: ActivityVersionId
fields.comment: OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.VERSION

fields.name: ActivityLatestVersionFlag
fields.comment: OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE. IS_LATEST_VERSION

fields.name: ActivitySpecVersionId
fields.comment: OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE. SPEC_VER_ID

fields.name: ActivitySpecVersionNumber
fields.comment: OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.SPEC_VER_NUMBER

fields.name: ActivityReworkReasonDesc
fields.comment: SELECT OSS_REWORK_REASON.REASON_CODEFROM OSS_REWORK_REASON WHERE OSS_REWORK_REASON.OID=OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.ACTIVITY2REWORK_REASON

fields.name: ActivityReworkReasonId
fields.comment: OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.ACTIVITY2REWORK_REASON

fields.name: ActivityRescheduleStartDate
fields.comment: Lookup on OSS_ACTIVITY_SCHEDULE based on OSS_ACTIVITY_SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE2ACTIVITY =Execution Plan Activity.Execution Plan Activity Key and take OSS_ACTIVITY_SCHEDULE.START_DATE//Only populated for reschedule activity.

fields.name: ActivityRescheduleEndDate
fields.comment: Lookup on OSS_ACTIVITY_SCHEDULE based on OSS_ACTIVITY_SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE2ACTIVITY =Execution Plan Activity.Execution Plan Activity Key and take OSS_ACTIVITY_SCHEDULE.END_DATE//Only populated for reschedule activity.

fields.name: ActivityRescheduleDurationValue
fields.comment: Lookup on OSS_ACTIVITY_SCHEDULE based on OSS_ACTIVITY_SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE2ACTIVITY =Execution Plan Activity.Execution Plan Activity Key and take OSS_ACTIVITY_SCHEDULE.DURATION_VALUE//Only populated for reschedule activity.

fields.name: ActivityRescheduleDurationUnit
fields.comment: Lookup on OSS_ACTIVITY_SCHEDULE based on OSS_ACTIVITY_SCHEDULE.SCHEDULE2ACTIVITY =Execution Plan Activity.Execution Plan Activity Key and take OSS_ACTIVITY_SCHEDULE.DURATION_UNIT//Only populated for reschedule activity.

fields.name: ActivityReasonComments
fields.comment: SELECT OSS_REWORK_REASON.COMMENTSFROM OSS_REWORK_REASON WHERE OSS_REWORK_REASON.OID=OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.ACTIVITY2REWORK_REASON

fields.name: ExecutionPlanId
fields.comment: OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.PLAN_ID

fields.name: ExecutionPlanVersion
fields.comment: OSS_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE.PLAN_VERSION

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
